email.subject: Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, Specialisation in AI Engineering (Permanent Position) - Karlstad University, Sweden

body.message: Considering applying to join the Software Quality and Digital Modernization (SQuaD) at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Karlstad University (Sweden). Details below.

department.name: Department of Mathematics and Computer Science
department.description: Our students and employees develop important knowledge that enrich both the individual and the community...

job_details.description: The Department of Mathematics and Computer Science hereby invites applications for a senior lectureship in Computer Science with a specialisation in AI Engineering.

duties.teaching: Contribute to both teaching and research in the AI domain, conduct innovative research in AI Engineering, deliver cutting-edge AI/ML content.
duties.collaboration: Striving for research collaboration with other colleagues at the Department, industry, and other academics.
duties.community_engagement: Collaborate with the wider community for mutual exchange.

requirements: Doctoral degree or equivalent in Computer Science or AI Engineering
notes: Candidates not proficient in Swedish may be hired with the requirement to actively acquire proficiency.

assessment_criteria.overall_criteria: Equal weight will given to pedagogical and scientific excellence.
special_weight: Merits in teaching in computer science applied to AI Engineering.
Recent research and development in computer science applied to AI Engineering.
considerable_weight: Contribution of knowledge and experience to the Department.
Current collaboration experience with the wider community.

application.submission_method: Via the University’s web-based recruitment tool, Varbi.
